name: Bug's Fight
description:
Protect your queen!

Choose one side of the board and buy units to fight in this 2 player local strategy turn based game.

*Note: Press space to end turn

Character descriptions:

Beetle: A melee unit that can deal quite a bit of damage while being tanky.

Weevil: A ranged unit that can hit you from a mile away, but it's very fragile.

Treehopper: A flying unit that can travel the map faster than any other unit!

Ladybug: A hard hitting unit that kills itself to deal a heavy hit to one opponent.

Castle: Helps you build economy by generating gold every round.
